src:
A única pessoa da escola que levou o Halloween a sério
04 Nov 2019, 20:30 by Joe



Ela até levou a imagem de referência porque sabia que ninguém ia entender.
Foi um dia ruim pra essa coitada…
text:
The only person in school who took Halloween seriously
04 Nov 2019, 20:30 by Joe



She even took the reference image because she knew no one would understand.
It was a bad day for this poor thing…
